text: lqd 'akhadhna aleahd almwkkad ealaa bani 'iisrayiyl fi altawrat balsme waltaet, wa'arsalna 'iilayhim bdhlk rslna, fanaqadu ma 'ukhdh ealayhim min alehd, watabaeuu ahwa'hm, wakanuu kulama ja'ahum rasul min 'uwlayik alrusul bima la tashtahih 'anfusahum eadawh: fakadhabuu fryqana min alrsl, waqutiluu fryqana akhr
